root.name: Dance Dance Revolution GB
root.description: OverviewDance Dance Revolution GB is a rhythm game developed and published by Konami for the Game Boy Color platform. Dance Dance Revolution GB was never released outside of Japan.Dance Pad Add-OnDance Pad AttachmentDance Dance Revolution GB originally came packaged with a small pad that clips on to the Game Boy Color itself to mimic the full size dance pads. The clip on dance pad was made to work like a traditional DDR dance mat, but instead of using feet it was made for fingers.GameplayThe gameplay in Dance Dance Revolution GB is similar to that of it's console and arcade counterparts. Arrows will scroll up the screen and the corresponding arrow must be pressed at the correct time. The game has the option to play either with or without the dance pad add-on.
